E-102 Gamma.

Idle: Station Square (station area).Text:
This station must be
the center of the city.
It's nice to have an ocean nearby.
I wonder if there are any fish here.

Idle: Station Square (city hall area).Text: This area has sure changed a lot.

Idle: Station Square (sewers).Text: This makes me feel like a rat.

Idle: Station Square (Twinkle Park entra.Text: I'm not too fond of places like this.
Hmm, I can't get into the park!

Idle: Station Square (hotel).Text: Hey-hey! There's no time to rest!

Idle: Station Square (casino/station).Text: There's no time for playing around!

Idle: Mystic Ruins (station area).Text: It must get pretty lonely here.

This area sure has changed
after they built this station.
I've got to find the Master Emerald.
I don't like places like this.

Idle: Mystic Ruins (Angel Island).Text:
I've got to get this island
airborne again.

Idle: Mystic Ruins (jungle).Text: Now this is more like it!
Which way did I come from?

This place gives me
the strangest feeling.

Idle: Final Egg entrance.Text: I'm going to do my best, Sonic.

Idle: Past (normal).Text:
Data not available.
Current location unknown.

Idle: Egg Carrier (outside).Text:
I wonder why that man bothered
making things like this.
Umm... How does this ship fly?

Idle: Egg Carrier (inside).Text: This ship is just too weird!
I wanna make a ship like this one day!

Better tread lightly
so they don't hear us.

Idle: Emerald Coast.Text: All I have to do is cruise this coast!

Idle: Windy Valley.Text: I can hear the wind in the distance.

Idle: Casinopolis.Text:
What's this smell?
Smells like trash!

Idle: Twinkle Park.Text:
This must be the entrance
to the bumper car area.
I wonder if the fish are biting.

Idle: Speed Highway.Text: Hey, there's no time to relax!

The cars are so slow!
They look like they're not moving.

The pieces for the Master Emerald
must be somewhere in this city.

Idle: Red Mountain.Text: Where did the Egg Carrier go?
Whoa! That lava looks really, really hot!
I sure don't wanna fall off!

Idle: Sky Deck.Text:
Whoa-whoa!
I sure don't wanna fall off from here!

It's pretty high!
My legs are shaking!
Hey, what's up with this ship?

Idle: Lost World.Text: The Emerald is somewhere in this room.

Idle: Final Egg.Text: Hey, little birdie. Are you okay?

Idle: Hot Shelter.Text: Umm... Which way do I go now?

Idle: Sonic's bosses.Text: He can't be invincible, can he?
Hey! This time you're not getting away!
Not bad, not bad at all!
Where can his weak spot be?

You've had your fun.
Now it's my turn!

Idle: Tails' bosses.Text: Come on, Tails! You can do it!
I know I can do it by myself!

Idle: Amy's boss (Zero).Text:
You're gonna pay
for what you've done!

Idle: Super Sonic.Text:
I'll show you what
the Chaos Emeralds can really do!

Idle: Chao Garden (Tails).Text: I really feel at home here!

Idle: Chao Garden (Knuckles).Text: I guess there are no Emeralds here.

I have this feeling
I've met these guys somewhere.

This place reminds me of home.
Wonder why?

Idle: Chao Garden (Amy).Text: I don't wanna see you guys fighting!

Idle: Sand Hill.Text: Shoot! I got sand in my eye!

Sky Chase 2 (before transformation).Text: Hope you know what you're doing.

Tails' stages - Sonic's voices.Text:
You don't have any rings, Tails.
Watch out!

Speed Highway (Tails) - Eggman's voices.Text: You think you can keep up with me?
I'll take their whole city with me!

Final Egg.Text:
Emergency! Emergency!
Dispose of any intruders!

Emergency! Emergency!
Dispose of any intruders!
Final Egg: Level 2 isolation wall open.
Final Egg: Level 2 isolation wall open.

Destroy the targets,
and you'll get extra time.

Bosses: Eggman.Text: No way! I can't believe this!

Ahhh!
He's not gonna get away with this!
No way! I can't believe this!
Ho-ho! It's no use. Give up!

Whoo-ha-ha! See if you can
make it through here, Sonic!

Announcers: Station Square.Text:
Please board the train
and wait for departure.

Please board the train
and wait for departure.

The train headed for the Mystic Ruins
will be departing soon.

The train headed for the Mystic Ruins
will be departing soon.

A train will be arriving soon.
Please stand back.

A train will be arriving soon.
Please stand back.
No trains are currently in service.
No trains are currently in service.

Announcers: Mystic Ruins.Text:
Passengers are requested
to wait onboard the train.

The train headed for Station Square
will be departing soon.

A train will be arriving soon.
Please stand back.
No trains are currently in service.

Gameplay voices: Sonic.Text: Hey, I'll play with you some other time!

Gameplay voices: Tails.Text: Phew! I made it in time!

Gameplay voices: Knuckles.Text: I can do better than that.

Gameplay voices: Big.Text: Aw, now what am I gonna do?

Cutscene: after Emerald Coast (Gamma).Text: This frog's the one we want!
My frog is the right one!

Beta restores: Big's unused fishing line.Text:
Almost got it!
Okay, once more.

Beta restores: Final Egg 1 (Sonic) inter.Text:
Intruder alert! Intruder alert!
Egg Keepers, report to battle stations!

Intruder alert! Intruder alert!
Egg Keepers, report to battle stations!

Beta restores: Final Egg (Amy) Eggman's.Text: Who-ha-ha! Why don't you give up?

Beta restores: Sky Deck unused lines.Text:
Emergency! Emergency!
Dispose of any intruders!

Emergency! Emergency!
Dispose of any intruders!

Descending into the clouds.
Slow the ship down.

Descending into the clouds.
Slow the ship down.

What a persistent hedgehog!
I'll shake you off.

Beta restores: Perfect Chaos unused Tika.Text: Sonic! It's up to you now.

In order to stay as Super Sonic,
you'll need rings!
